data.message: Implement Decision Outcomes v1 - wire decisions into feedback loop: Complete. Added decisions_used to episodes, auto-generate decision updates in store_evaluation with de-dupe, deterministic status rules (validated >= 0.7, reversed <= 0.3), guardrails for decision updates. All 6 smoke tests pass.
